attributes.action: Limit the length of time unemployment benefits are payable to encourage people back to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Limit the amount of time unemployment benefit and associated benefits are payable, or reduce them over a period of time. This would remove the long term dependance often built up on these benefits and encourage those receiving payments to find themselves gainful employment in society as quickly as possible. The would also have the additional benefit of reducing crime, spending on police forces, criminal courts and prisions which can only benefit everyone.
